name: White Women's Tears
description:
I read about the impact white women's tears have over Black bodies and it really hit hard the intense manipulation and invented fear towards Black people from white women dating back centuries. I made this piece to help build thought and mindfulness that we, as white women/nonbinary femmes, do not need to be in the center and to turn the other cheek. Feminism is more than for white women/people. We should not use our emotions to put people in literal life danger. Think before you call the police/call for help. Think before you release your emotions. Consider the space you take up - it's not always about you.
- 
Made with magazine clippings from Europe and manipulated in Photoshop.
